function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Regular system checks and updates, along with human oversight and intervention, can reduce the risk of missed detections","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Regular monitoring and adjustment of the model, using techniques like dropout and data augmentation","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Verify the authenticity and accuracy of the images before using them for training and testing","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regularly evaluate the performance of the cnn architecture and consider alternative architectures for comparison","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement dropout layers, use regularization techniques, and cross-validation to prevent overfitting","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforcement of face mask policies, public awareness campaigns","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Supervised operation of driverless vehicles, regular human review of monitoring data","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement strict data protection regulations, obtain consent for monitoring, and anonymize personal data.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Compliance with privacy regulations, transparency in data usage, and ethical guidelines for data collection.","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement stringent cybersecurity measures, adopt encryption and authentication protocols, and conduct regular security audits.","category":"Facilitate
